thread.title: Trapped reality TV star escapes out window of her smashed up car after colliding with lorry on roundabout
thread.title_full: Trapped reality TV star escapes out window of her smashed up car after colliding with lorry on roundabout

author: Alan Weston
title: Trapped reality TV star escapes out window of her smashed up car after colliding with lorry on roundabout
text:
News Trapped reality TV star escapes out window of her smashed up car after colliding with lorry on roundabout Later Chelsey Harwood, who appeared in Celebrity Botched Bodies, shared pictures of her white Smart car soon after the accident to her 42,800 social media followers Share The car was badly damaged (Photo: Liverpool Echo/Chelsey Harwood) Share Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
This was the scene after a reality TV star's car was involved in a crash with a lorry this evening. 
The collision took place on a road near the busy Switch Island in Liverpool at the height of this evening’s rush hour . 
It led to massive traffic congestion after the lorry was left blocking four lanes of the carriageway heading towards the M57. 
Later Chelsey Harwood, who appeared in Celebrity Botched Bodies, shared pictures of her white Smart car soon after the accident to her 42,800 social media followers. 
The pictures showed extensive damage to the front and one side of the car. Chelsey Harwood The collision caused rush hour chaos (Photo: Liverpool Echo/Chelsey Harwood) 
She told the Liverpool ECHO she escaped by climbing out of the car window. 
She added: “I banged my head on the window as I was taken sideways across the junction.” 
Police said they were were informed of the accident around 5.40pm. 
A spokesperson said shortly afterwards: “There does not appear, at this time, to be any injuries reported from the accident.” The car was dwarfed in size by the huge lorry (Photo: Liverpool Echo/Chelsey Harwood) The authorities removed the vehicles from the roundabout (Photo: Liverpool Echo/Chelsey Harwood) Chelsey Harwood with her new man 
Delays were experienced on the M57, M58 and Broom’s Cross Road approaching Switch Island. 
Officers from Merseyside Police were advising drivers to avoid the area at all costs and to find alternative routes to their destinations. 
This Is Liverpool and Hollyoaks cast member Chelsey was born a boy and now describes herself as a transgender actress. 
She has also appeared on Celebrity Botched Up Bodies to reveal the horrifying effects of her surgery mistakes. Like us on Facebook
